scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of a transcript of Katherine Anne Porter.

did.unittitle: Katherine Anne Porter, College Park, Maryland, to [Alice] Ford 1970 Sep 2

scopecontent.p: [Typed transcript of TLS with additions by Ford; outlines family history from arrival of Robert Porter in Pennsylvania in 1720; apologizes for "helter-skelter" quality of letter which suffers from effects of several debilitating accidents; Ford corrects names and dates; alludes to Porter family connection with John James Audubon and traces its root to County Donegal, Ireland, based on telephone conversations with Katherine Anne Porter.]
